content: As you reach a group of bodies frozen in the snow, a strange monkey will be alerted to your presence, throwing a piece of fruit at one of the corpses to awaken it from its slumber.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
As you reach a group of bodies frozen in the snow, a strange monkey will be alerted to your presence, throwing a piece of fruit at one of the corpses to awaken it from its slumber.
